Convert F\+R\+O\+M\+\_\+\+L\+E\+N bytes at F\+R\+O\+M\+\_\+\+B\+U\+F into a hex representation in T\+O\+\_\+\+B\+U\+F, which must be twice as long plus one byte for the null terminator.
